caption.p: ( a) A diversity of viral diversity: examples of major human infections showing different patterns of evolution (Taken from (Ref. [ 58]), and references therein; Adapted from Fig. 1, Grenfell et al. [ 58]) ( b) Schematic illustration of the “epochal evolution” model, which seeks to explain notable features in the phylogeny of human influenza A (panel a, rightmost phylogeny) (Taken from figure in van Nimwegen [ 59])
